lead_paragraph: Shortstop Edgar Renteria's three-run home run in the top of the seventh inning broke a 0-0 tie and sent San Francisco on its way to a 3-1 victory over the Texas Rangers in Game 5 on Monday night, giving the Giants their first World Series title since 1954 and their first in California.
snippet: Live analysis of Game 5 of the World Series, San Francisco Giants at Texas Rangers.

headline.main: Game 5 Final: Giants Win World Series

abstract: Live analysis of Game 5 of the World Series, San Francisco Giants at Texas Rangers.
